snippet: Ana Konjuh, 15, of Croatia outlasted Alicia Black, 15, of Boca Raton, Fla., 3-6, 6-4,7-6 (6), to win the U.S. Open girls’ singles championship Sunday, and Konjuh’s countryman Borna Coric, 16, won for the boys’ singles championship.
abstract: Ana Konjuh, 15, of Croatia outlasted Alicia Black, 15, of Boca Raton, Fla., 3-6, 6-4,7-6 (6), to win the U.S. Open girls’ singles championship Sunday, and Konjuh’s countryman Borna Coric, 16, won for the boys’ singles championship.

headline.main: Croatians Win Junior Titles at U.S. Open
